data.name: Devilian - Ultimate Hellraiser Pack
data.detailed_description:
Show the devils what true terror is! This pack contains everything needed to unleash your full potential, including Talisman Boxes, Blessings, Refining Stones, Revival Stones, Reentry Tickets, 3 brand new Talismans, and much, much more!

30-day Patron Access

Gain 25% more EXP, earn special daily rewards, access your Warehouse anywhere, and more!

8 Enigma Keys

Unlock Enigma Boxes and claim the treasures within

10 Essence Crystal Boxes

Grants items to increase your Resistance when opened

8 Gemmed Talisman Boxes

Grants a Rare, Heroic, or Legendary Talisman when opened

10 Archdevil Reentry Tickets

Reset your Archdevil Dungeon entry count

7-day Bolton's Blessing

Earn 25% more Gold

7-day Elara's Blessing

Earn 50% more XP and Devil Souls

5 Glowing Sacrificial Talisman Boxes

Grants Sacrificial Talismans when opened

25 Refining Stones

Randomize attributes on Grand and better equipment

Proficiency Skill Reset Scroll

Reset your Proficiency Skill points

Furious Jirah Talisman

Earn 5% more XP and 2.5% more Gold in Dungeons

Benevolent Tempera Talisman

Earn 10% more XP and Gold in the Abyssal Tower

Sharpshooter Darius Talisman

Gain +5% Devilian Penetration and +1.8% Devilian Life Absorb

data.short_description: Show the devils what  true terror is! This pack contains everything needed to unleash your full potential, including Talisman Boxes, Blessings, Refining Stones, Revival Stones, Reentry Tickets, 3 brand new Talismans, and much, much more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
